alert.note: Alert for Eastern Walsh County; Grand Forks; Pembina (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued April 17 at 3:39AM CDT until April 18 at 4:00AM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO 4 AM CDT MONDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 7 inches. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Pembina, Eastern Walsh and Grand Forks Counties. * WHEN...From noon today to 4 AM CDT Monday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for North Dakota can be found at dot.nd.gov/travel and for Minnesota at 511mn.org, or by calling 5 1 1 in either state.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Walsh County; Grand Forks; Pembina
